title: Slaves to the Empowered: Volumes of Lageyan Lore
description: (No longer in print) Slaves to the Empowered begins a series exploring what happens when good people find themselves on the wrong side of religious dogma. It conveys the difficult decisions and sinister allies these people must make simply to survive. This epic fantasy introduces us to the world of Lageya, a world of illicit magick and warring cultures, where seven, self-proclaimed 'divine' kingdoms maintain rule by crushing all others. The empowered keep the Gellic Nation to fulfill certain services, thus these enslaved must obey when ordered to eliminate a malevolent cult in lands filled with wicked and sexual activities. But good and evil are not always as they seem, and when the light betrays you, a greater ally can be found in the dark. --Contains some adult language and situations.
author: Jeremiah Cain
